Class ConcatenateAudioAndVideo

  • Object
    • ConcatenateAudioAndVideo

  • public class ConcatenateAudioAndVideo
extends Object
    A very simple media transcoder which uses IMediaReader, IMediaWriter and IMediaViewer.

      • concatenate

        public static void concatenate(String sourceUrl1,
               String sourceUrl2,
               String destinationUrl)
        Concatenate two source files into one destination file.
        Parameters:
        sourceUrl1 - the file which will appear first in the output
        sourceUrl2 - the file which will appear second in the output
        destinationUrl - the file which will be produced
